Desc.entry: Judi Machin offers home tuition in the following subjects: General Computing, Internet/Email, Word Processing, Spreadsheets, Databases, Powerpoint/Presentations, CLAIT/CLAIT Plus, ITQ, and family history research. Qualifications - Member of IFL/IHGS/Society of Genealogists. One-to-one tuition in students' own home, covering Sheffield, Chesterfield and the Peak District.
